short_summary: The department of National Defence needs  transportation repair parts kits. The delivery requested is without specifying how long within the month.
description: The purpose of this contract is to provide the Department of National Defence with the transportation repair parts kits. Please see ANNEX A for details.
duration_in_months: You must deliver your supplies within 60 days by February 29, 2024 or before.
full_summary:
Spare Parts
=====================================================================

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: cb-280-15896884
* **Amendment Number**: 7
* **Solicitation Number**: W8486-249262/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-10-16
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-27 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-12-01
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-02-29

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Category**: Government Defense (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region) and Alberta

**Contracting Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Goods and Services**

* The Department of National Defence requires spare parts for various items, including:
	+ Fuel tanks and systems
	+ Transportation repair parts kits
	+ Security wire
	+ Hooks
	+ Bushings
	+ Sprockets
	+ Liquid gaskets
	+ Lamp components and accessories
	+ Optical lighting
	+ Iron tubes and assembly
* Delivery is requested at Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal or Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot

**Submission Guidelines**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* Bids must be submitted by email only to DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* Please review the section entitled Electronic Submission of Bids in the solicitation document for details

**Attachments**

* Amendment 001: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22322/w8486-249262---spares-buy---ammendment-001.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22322/w8486-249262---spares-buy---ammendment-001.pdf)
* Request for Proposal (RFP): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/t
